title: ASHE SKINS
body: Since i don't have a skin for {{champion:22}}  and i main ADC i would like to get {{champion:22}}  a skin since i have a skin for pretty much every other ADC so what skin do YOU think I should get?

replies.body: Sherwood forest is a mad skin.. Underated.

should get amethyst, really its the best one

(I dont know if its legacy or not, I know queen is, but I bought it ages ago)
-otherwise heartseeker
The 1 thing i don't like about amethyst is the hair it disturbs me XD
